coreAttributes.name: opaque demonstone
coreAttributes.description: A common type of demonstone, the power of which can be absorbed into a person's aura in order to enhance their unarmed strikes with extra elemental damage. Demonstones, such as this one, are rumoured to be crystallised essences of a Lilin's orgasm.
coreAttributes.attackTooltipDescription: Strike at [npc.name] in melee, using your crystal's power to inflict extra damage!
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(focus)] on the energy in the demonstone. As [npc.she] [npc.does] so, it dissolves and flows into [npc.her] aura, granting [npc.herHim] the ability to perform arcane-imbued unarmed attacks.
coreAttributes.unequipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(focus)] on extracting the absorbed arcane energy inside of [npc.her] aura. As [npc.she] [npc.does] so, it reforms back into an opaque demonstone.

#IF(npc.isFeral()) Striking out at [npc2.name], [npc.name] [npc.verb(manage)] to land a solid kick on [npc2.her] [npc2.leg]! #ELSE Striking out at [npc2.name], [npc.name] [npc.verb(manage)] to land a solid punch on [npc2.her] [npc2.arm]! #ENDIF

#IF(npc.isFeral()) [npc.Name] [npc.verb(strike)] out at [npc2.name] in unarmed combat, and [npc.verb(manage)] to land a solid kick on [npc2.her] torso. #ELSE [npc.Name] [npc.verb(strike)] out at [npc2.name] in unarmed combat, and [npc.verb(manage)] to land a solid hit on [npc2.her] torso. #ENDIF
